articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to May 11 Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to May 11 Factory
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, provided field guidance to the May 11 Factory.
					 The factory is a modern scientific research and production center which researches and develops varieties of electronic goods including liquid crystal display TV sets urgently required by the people's cultural and emotional life.
					
					 Going round the electronic device assembling shop and other places, he acquainted himself in detail with the modernization, management and operation of the factory.
					
					 He highly praised the scientists, technicians and workers of the factory for displaying creative working style and patriotic enthusiasm in building new process capable of producing hundreds of thousands of liquid crystal display TV sets in a year and thus laying a solid groundwork for mass-producing such TV sets of various sizes.
					
					 Seeing with keen interest new equipment and multilayer printed circuit boards requiring high-tech researched and developed by the scientists and technicians of the factory, he said it is great success that they provided a firm scientific and technological guarantee for economic development including electronics industry.
					
					 The officials, scientists and technicians of the factory newly researched and developed varieties of electronic goods of high performance at the factory because they worked hard with the single desire to glorify the cause of building a thriving nation with great scientific research achievements, looking at the world with their feet planted on their ground, he said. These shining achievements are a clear proof of the validity and vitality of the Party's policy on taking hold on science and technology as the lifeline for the building of an economic power, he added.
					
					 He put forward the important tasks facing the factory.
					
					 What is important is to rapidly increase the production of articles for cultural use and electronic goods including liquid crystal display TV sets to meet the requirements in the era of knowledge-based economy and the daily-growing need of the people, he said.
					
					 It is of special importance to improve the quality of all products turned out at the factory and, at the same time, cut down the production cost through deep-going scientific researches, he noted, stressing that only then, the products of this factory can be popular among customers and it is possible to bring about a new turn in enterprise management.
					
					 In order to effect a new turn in the development and production of electronic goods to meet the requirements of the new century, it is imperative to provide ample conditions for scientific researches and production and pay deep attention to the living of the scientists and technicians.
					
					 He had a photo session with the employees of the factory.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, and senior officials of the WPK Central Committee

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Acquaints Himself with Construction Sites
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Acquaints Himself with Construction Sites 
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim acquainted himself on the spot with the construction sites of Pyongyang Folk Park and holy land of Taekwon-do and the exhibition of August 3 consumer goods produced in Pyongyang city on Tuesday and Wednesday.
					 He looked round the general history education area and folk rural area of the Park and the construction site of holy land of Taekwon-do and convened consultative meetings there.
					
					 The meetings discussed measures for qualitatively building in a short span of time the edifices showing the shining tradition of the Korean nation with five-thousand years of history, culture, wisdom and talents.
					
					 He went round light industrial goods displayed in the exhibition of August 3 consumer goods produced in Pyongyang city now underway at the Three Revolution Exhibition.
					
					 He called on all the relevant units to produce more quality goods to meet the requirements of the people by thoroughly implementing the Party policy of decisively increasing the production of consumer goods, thus making a tangible contribution to improving the standard of people's living.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Cuban Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with outgoing Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK, Singaporean FMs
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK, Singaporean FMs
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Talks between DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun and Singaporean Foreign Minister K. Shanmugam were held in Singapore on July 27.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Singapore and from the opposite side were the permanent secretary of the Foreign Ministry and others concerned.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue to boost the bilateral friendly relations and a series of issues of mutual concern.
					
					 The Singaporean foreign minister gave a reception for the DPRK delegation that day.

articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK, Malaysian FMs
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK, Malaysian FMs
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Talks were held on July 26 between Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun and his Malaysian counterpart Datuk Anifah Aman. Pak is leading the DPRK delegation on a visit to Malaysia.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Malaysia and from the opposite side the first deputy secretary general of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the director general for East Asia and officials concerned of the ministry.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of the situation of their countries and exchanged views on further development of the friendly relations between the two countries and on matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Talks Held between KPA and Lao People's Army Delegations
articles.content:
Talks Held between KPA and Lao People's Army Delegations
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Talks between a military delegation of the Korean People's Army and a delegation of the General Staff of the Lao People's Army took place in Pyongyang on Thursday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals  and officers of the KPA and from the Lao side members of the delegation of the General Staff of the Laotian People's Army led by Chief Sanyahak Phomvihane and Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting the friendly relations between the armies of the two countries and on matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Gift from Russian Foundation
articles.content:
Gift from Russian Foundation
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Russkiy Mir Foundation of Russia.
					 It was handed to an official concerned Thursday by Georgii Toloraya, director of the Regional Planning Department of the foundation, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Lao Military Delegation Visits the Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
Lao Military Delegation Visits the Kumsusan Memorial Palace
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the General Staff of the Laotian People's Army led by Chief Sanyahak Phomvihane visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Thursday to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The visitors laid a floral basket before the statue of the President in the name of the delegation.
					
					 They made deep bows to the President who made undying contributions to development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Laos and global independence of mankind.

articles.title: Lao Military Delegation Visits Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Lao Military Delegation Visits Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the General Staff of the Laotian People's Army led by Chief Sanyahak Phomvihane visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong Thursday.
					  Members of the delegation laid bunches of flowers before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, and observed a moment's silence in memory of her.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the delegation was placed at the cemetery.
					
					 The visitors paid a silent tribute to the memory of revolutionary martyrs.

articles.title: DPRK Hit by Heavy Rain Again
articles.content:
DPRK Hit by Heavy Rain Again
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Many areas of the DPRK have been seriously affected by heavy rainfalls again. 
					 According to data available for the Hydro-meteorological Service, 100-500mm torrential rains came down in some areas of North and South Hwanghae, Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces and Kaesong City from around 00:00 Tuesday to noon Thursday.
					
					 It rained 564mm, 469mm, 339mm and 337mm in South Hwanghae Province's Chongdan, Pongchon and Kangryong counties and Haeju City respectively. And it rained 397mm in Kaesong City and 343mm, 333mm, 328mm in Kangwon Province's Sepho, Phyonggang and Changdo counties respectively and 341mm in Phyongsan County, North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The downpours severely damaged economic sectors in the afflicted areas.
					
					 An initial survey shows more than 36,000 hectares of cropland were flooded in South Hwanghae Province, some 20,000 hectares of them being submerged.
					
					 Thousands of dwelling houses and hundreds of industrial establishments, schools and public buildings were destroyed.

articles.title: Chinese Tourist Group Here
articles.content:
Chinese Tourist Group Here
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A Chinese tourist group by the Pyongyang-Xi'an international air service led by Zhuang Jun, general manager of the Chinese Kanghui Xi'an International Tourist Agency, arrived here Thursday.

articles.title: 10th Anniversary of Visit to Russia Marked
articles.content:
10th Anniversary of Visit to Russia Marked
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A photo and book exhibition opened at the Pyongyang Center for Cultural Exchange with Foreign Countries with due ceremony on Thursday to mark the 10th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Russia and the adoption of the DPRK-Russia Moscow Declaration.
					 Displayed in the venue were photographs such as a photo showing Kim Jong Il meeting with former Russian President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, those dealing with his visit to Russia, those introducing Russia and Russian books. 
					
					 Present there were Chairperson of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Kim Jong Suk, Vice-chairman of the Committee Mun Jae Chol who is chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, officials concerned, working people in the city, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Valery E. Sukhinin and staff members of his embassy here and the delegation of Russkiy Mir Foundation of Russia. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk said that Kim Jong Il paid a historic visit to Russia to boost the ties of DPRK-Russia friendship and make an undying contribution to developing the bilateral relations.
					
					 She expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop favorably in different fields. 
					
					 Valery E. Sukhinin said that Kim Jong Il's visit to the Russian Federation marked an important landmark in the development of the Russia-DPRK relations and contributed to expanding cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 He wished the Korean people fresh success in their struggle for building a thriving nation.
					
					 On the same day the participants watched at Taedongmun Cinema DPRK documentary films "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il pays an official visit to the Russian Federation" August 4-5, Juche 90 (2001) and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il pays an unofficial visit to cities of the Russian Federation and sojourns there" July 26-August 18, Juche 90 (2001).

articles.title: Citations Awarded to Employees of Unhasu Orchestra
articles.content:
Citations Awarded to Employees of Unhasu Orchestra
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Commendations were conferred on creators, artistes and others of the Unhasu Orchestra with due ceremony on Thursday.
					 Decrees of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly were read out before awarding them.
					
					 The commendations included Kim Il Sung Prize, wrist watch bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung, citation of general secretary Kim Jong Il, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize, honorary titles, Order of National Flag First Class, Order of Labor, Order of National Flag Second and Third Classes and Medal of Merit.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Successful Advance of June 15 Cause Called for
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Successful Advance of June 15 Cause Called for
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The June 15 cause is a patriotic one of reunification for accomplishing the sacred cause of national independence under the banner of by the Korean nation itself, the idea of reunification in the new century.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 joint declaration the core of which is the idea of "By our nation itself", out of his patriotic will to achieve the cause of national reunification at any cost through reconciliation and unity between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 The idea represents national independence and great unity helping all the fellow countrymen reject the foreign forces' aggression with transparent consciousness of independence and achieve national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 Since the publication of the declaration the movement of national reunification has witnessed events and successes unprecedented in the past.
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself" has remarkably stoked up the Koreans' consciousness of independence and, in this course, national independence has become an irresistible trend of the times.
					
					 National cooperation has become a desire of the fellow countrymen and mode of struggle for unity and reunification despite the vicious moves of foreign forces for domination and interference. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have made fundamental progress and the national reconciliation, cooperation and exchanges have reached a higher level.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas turned out under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to make tangible contributions to the cause of reunification. They are conducting a dynamic struggle against foreign forces and sycophantic traitors in their moves for a war against reunification.  
					
					 The June 15 cause, the cause of "By our nation itself", is sure to triumph as long as it advances amid firm support from all the Koreans, guided by the great idea, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Peace Mechanism on Korean Peninsula Called for
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Peace Mechanism on Korean Peninsula Called for
 Pyongyang July 28 (KCNA) -- It is an urgent task of the era that brooks no further delay to replace the armistice system by peace-keeping mechanism. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a bylined commentary with the lapse of 58 years since the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement (AA) between the DPRK and the United States. 
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 An instable truce situation which is neither peace nor war has lasted for more than half a century on the Korean Peninsula. This is something abnormal unprecedented in the world history as well as a tragedy of the present times. 
					
					 The current armistice system is so fragile and the peninsula is technically at war that no one can predict at which moment a big military conflict will break out.
					
					 Establishing peace-keeping mechanism serves as a fundamental key to completely removing the acute military confrontation and the danger of a war from the peninsula. 
					
					 As long as huge forces of the DPRK and the U.S. stand in acute confrontation, it is not possible to remove distrust between the two sides nor is it possible to solve any bilateral issues.
					
					 Replacing the AA by a peace one would help the DPRK and the U.S. build trust and improve relations on the principle of mutual respect and equality. 
					
					 The U.S. is chiefly to blame for the failure of concluding the peace agreement as it has pursued a hostile policy toward the DPRK under the shadow of the AA for the past more than half a century.
					
					 Whether the peace-keeping mechanism is set up on the Korean Peninsula or not entirely depends on the U.S. attitude. 
					
					 The U.S. should not make empty words but make practical actions to fulfill its legal and moral obligations and responsibility for peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The world hopes to see durable peace settled on the peninsula.

articles.title: Taedonggang Fruit Farm Expands Orchard Area
articles.content:
Taedonggang Fruit Farm Expands Orchard Area
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm in Pyongyang has taken on a new look.
					 It, covering some 1,000 hectares, produces fruits in a scientific, modern and intensive way.
					
					 Over the past one year, the farm has built a new apple tree nursery of 50 hectares, combined fruit processing factory, pig farm, net factory and other modernly equipped facilities.
					
					 A drop irrigation system has been applied to orchards.
					
					 The nursery has based sapling cultivation on tissue culture. 
					
					 The pig farm has a process of producing several thousand tons of organic fertilizers every year, making a ring-shaped cyclic production system available for fruit cultivation and stock raising.
					
					 The fruit farm also has modern dwelling houses and service facilities for its employees.
					
					 The farm project has been carried on in three stages from December 2008. It has needed rezoning of more than 1,000 hectares, digging of holes extending 2,800km, application of 120,000 tons of manure, installment of 360,000 concrete props, planting of millions of saplings and construction of a 140km-long road, 1,260 homes and public buildings.

articles.title: Jong Ju Yong, Pioneer in North-South Economic Cooperation
articles.content:
Jong Ju Yong, Pioneer in North-South Economic Cooperation
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Jong Ju Yong, former honorary chairman of the Hyundai Group of south Korea, was one of the patriotic-minded businessmen who put the nation's interests above political view.
					 His motto was to serve for the nation through business activities. During his long career as a businessman, however, he failed to enjoy the pleasures of life.
					
					 In his waning years, he took a turnabout in his life, motivated by the belief that genuine patriotism finds itself in the effort for the country's reunification.
					
					 At that time, Jong was suffering from difficulties in his business, caused by government authorities' political pressure, as he acted against their will. He began to incline towards the north that he left many years ago, and made up his mind to visit it. 
					
					 While touring his native place, Thongchon in Kangwon Province, and Mt. Kumgang, a scenic resort, he determined to do something for national reunification.
					
					 One day, he read leader Kim Jong Il's celebrated work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation".
					
					 He was deeply moved by the work declaring the north was willing to join hands with all pro-reunification persons of national conscience, even ruling forces, conglomerators and army generals.
					
					 He shifted his business strategy to cooperation and exchange with the north.
					
					 On October 30, Juche 87 (1998), Kim Jong Il met visiting Jong Ju Yong and his entourage and asked about his health, calling him "Mr. honorary chairman."
					
					 He highly appreciated the personality of Jong carrying into practice what he intends to do.
					
					 He also said he would always join hands with those doing good things for the nation and expressed support for Hyundai in its business for cooperation and exchange between the north and south.
					
					 Back to south Korea, he introduced Kim Jong Il's great traits at a press conference.
					
					 When a south Korean journalist asked him why he spoke well of Kim Jong Il, Jong replied that the leader was the greatest man he had ever seen in the world.
					
					 Afterwards, he developed the Mt. Kumgang tourist destination and began operating a passenger liner in the East Sea in November 1998 for the mountain tourism.
					
					 In June 2000, when Kim Jong Il met Jong again, he praised the south Korean businessman as a pioneer in opening a way of national reconciliation and that his merit would be recorded in history.
					
					 Upon hearing the news of his death on March 21, 2001, he sent a mourning delegation to south Korea, the first of its kind since the division of the country, along with his message of condolence and wreath.
					
					 When a Hyundai-funded gymnasium was built on the banks of the Pothong River, he had it named Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Gymnasium.

articles.title: Free Medical Care System Introduced in Wartime
articles.content:
Free Medical Care System Introduced in Wartime 
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK introduced a universal, free medical care system in the country in the period of the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953).
					 One January day in Juche 41 (1952), an official of the Ministry of Public Health, was summoned by President Kim Il Sung to the supreme command of the Korean People's Army.  
					
					 Some days ago, the official had submitted to the President a suggestion that a large amount of money should be allocated to killing germs spread by the U.S. through bombs. 
					
					 When he arrived at the supreme command, the President told him that the Korean people were fighting at the cost of their lives in both front and rear for the victory in the war and that a free medical care system should be applied to them.
					
					  The official was surprised by what the President said because he knew well that the country, though it was at war, should allot a huge amount of money for a universal, free medical care system. 
					
					 The President went on to say though the economic situation of the country was difficult, a free medical treatment system was necessary to promote public health. Nothing is more important than the people's health, he added.
					
					 The cabinet made public a decision on November 13, 1952, to introduce a universal, free medical care system in the country.
					
					The landmark decision stirred up the hearts of all people.

articles.title: Anniversary of Sinking of "General Sherman" Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Sinking of "General Sherman" Observed
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A seminar in the field of social sciences took place in Pyongyang on Thursday to mark the 145th anniversary of the sinking of the U.S. imperialist aggressor ship "General Sherman".
					 Present there were Thae Hyong Chol, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, officials concerned, researchers, teachers, journalists and editors in social sciences, education and media.
					
					 Prof. and Dr. Jo Hui Sung, director of an institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, proved at the seminar that the intrusion of "General Sherman" which was a curtain raiser to the aggression of Korea was the first armed invasion carried out by the U.S. reactionary government under its long-term premeditated preparations.
					
					 Dr. Kim Pyong Chol, head of a department of Kim Il Sung University, said that Koreans started an all-out attack in September 1866 under the command of ardent patriot Kim Ung U, sending the ship into the bottom of the Taedong River through a large-scale fire-attack. The sinking of the ship was the fruition of the patriotic self-sacrificing struggle waged by people of the Walled City of Pyongyang, he added.
					
					 The floor was also taken by Associate Professor Kim Tok Song, head of a department of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Hwang Yun Ju, teacher of Kim Chol Ju University of Education, Prof. and Candidate Academician and Dr. Ri Yong Hwan, researcher at the Academy of Social Sciences.
					
					 They referred to the facts that the U.S. imperialists, far from drawing a proper lesson from the incident of "General Sherman," got more frantic in their aggression of Korea as it was evidenced by their exhumation of Prince Nam Yon's Tomb and their large-scale armed invasion in 1871.
					
					 They noted that the U.S. imperialists' aggression which was kicked off with the intrusion of the ship is still going on and their forces' presence in south Korea is bringing unspeakable misfortune and sufferings to the Koreans.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists ignite another war in Korea, the army and people of the DPRK will wipe them out with decisive and deadly retaliatory blows and achieve the historic cause of national reunification, they stressed.

articles.title: Anniversary of Factory College Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Factory College Marked
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- 60 years have passed since the first college factory emerged in the DPRK. 
					 During the hard-fought war President Kim Il Sung visited this newly-established college (July 15, 1951) several times and indicated detailed ways for running and managing it and displaying its advantages and energetically led the work for their materialization.
					
					 General secretary Kim Jong Il clarified the tasks and ways to increase factory colleges and raise the qualitative level of education at those colleges and improve the educational method.
					
					  A lot of factory colleges were set up in different parts of the country under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great persons and turned into credible bases for technical personnel and centres for scientific and technological development of the country.
					
					  A national meeting took place at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on July 28 to mark the day.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kang Nung Su, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned and officials, teachers and students of factory colleges.
					
					  Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission, delivered a report at the meeting.

articles.title: Russia Intensifies Combat against Terrorism
articles.content:
Russia Intensifies Combat against Terrorism 
 Moscow, July 27 (KCNA) -- Russia has intensified the combat against terrorism, registering signal achievements.
					 209 terrorists were wiped out and about 680 weapons and a lot of ammunitions on an illegal deal confiscated in the North Caucasus region in the first half of the year, the Russian minister of Interior said on July 24.
					
					 In this period the terrorist acts in the region reportedly decreased 36 percent as compared with the same period of last year.

articles.title: Iran's Majlis Speaker Condemns U.S., Israel's Base Act
articles.content:
Iran's Majlis Speaker Condemns U.S., Israel's Base Act
						
 Tehran, July 27 (KCNA) -- Iran's Majlis (parliament) Speaker Ali Larijani in an interview with a Press TV on July 24 condemned the U.S. and Israel's base act.
					 As regards the assassination of an Iranian nuclear physicist on July 23, he said that the U.S. and Zionists have resorted to such terrorist acts because of failing in their adventures in the region.
					
					 The current assassination is another instance demonstrating the U.S. hostility toward Iran, he noted.

articles.title: Zimbabwe Accuses U.S. of Arresting It from Trading Diamonds
articles.content:
Zimbabwe Accuses U.S. of Arresting It from Trading Diamonds
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Zimbabwean minister of Mines and Mining Development accused the United States of arresting the country from trading diamonds.
					 The U.S. and her allies have been working against Zimbabwe's economic recovery plan through illegal sanctions and other moves such as blocking Zimbabwe's bid to trade in Marange Diamonds, he said.
					
					 The Zimbabwean government is considering taking stern action against mining firms that are supported by hostile nations which are against Zimbabwe's free trading, he said.

articles.title: U.S. Anti-Venezuela Moves under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Anti-Venezuela Moves under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Latin American Parliament member Marelis Perez, when interviewed by the Prensa Latina News Agency of Cuba recently, strongly denounced the U.S. for its moves against Venezuela.
					 The U.S. is getting hell-bent on a smear campaign such as including Venezuela on the list of nations that supposedly fail to meet international commitments to stop drug trafficking, he said. The U.S. accusations against Venezuela aim to discredit the revolutionary process.
					
					 The U.S. is deliberately ignoring the Venezuelan government's efforts against drug trafficking and applying double-standard to it, he charged.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits Pakistan
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits Pakistan
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 5.0 on the Richter scale jolted Pakistan on Sunday.
					 The epicenter was 87 km southwest of Kalat, Pakistan.

articles.title: More Afghans Killed by NATO Troops
articles.content:
More Afghans Killed by NATO Troops
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- NATO troops in Afghanistan continue killing civilians under the pretext of "anti-terrorism".
					 NATO forces recently fired at a running vehicle in Wardak Province, killing three civilians.
					
					 This has lashed the locals into a great fury.

articles.title: Retraction of Seoul Prosecutor's Nomination as Public Prosecutor General Demanded
articles.content:
Retraction of Seoul Prosecutor's Nomination as Public Prosecutor General Demanded
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Teachers Union opposed the unreasonable reshuffle by the puppet authorities in a commentary on July 21.
					 The commentary accused Lee Myung Bak of nominating Han Sang Dae, chief of the Seoul District Public Prosecutor's Office, as public prosecutor general despite the opposition of different circles.
					
					 Han was in direct charge of the investigation into the unprecedented suppression of teachers and government employees and persistently opposed the reinstatement of the unreasonably dismissed teachers, it said.
					
					 Han perpetrated whole gamut of irregularities and corruption typified by the two illegal acts of falsifying the place of residence to send his children to good schools, it held.
					
					 Such a guy should not be allowed to hold the post of the chief prosecutor, it said, demanding Lee Myung Bak retract the nomination of Han to the post.

articles.title: U.S. Act of Spraying Defoliant in All Parts of S. Korea Disclosed
articles.content:
U.S. Act of Spraying Defoliant in All Parts of S. Korea Disclosed
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists sprayed defoliant not only in the Demilitarized Zone but all other areas of south Korea, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 This shocking fact was exposed by an American, who served as a GI in south Korea in the 1960s, at a meet-the-press on July 25.
					
					 He, one of the victims to the defoliant, said he had statements written by 300 U.S. soldiers who served in south Korea in the 1960s-1970s period.

articles.title: Suppression of Workers' Actions for Vital Rights Slammed
articles.content:
Suppression of Workers' Actions for Vital Rights Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions demanded the withdrawal of lay-off and stop to the suppression of trade unions. The organization held a rally in the plaza of the Seoul City Office on July 23 with more than 3,000 unionists attending. 
					 At the rally speakers denounced the Hanjin Heavy Industries Co. Ltd. and the Yusong Enterprise for setting in motion gangsters to crack down workers calling for their vital rights.
					
					 They cannot stop the actions till they gain the basic labor rights and political freedom, they said. They would further expand sit-in hunger strikes.
					
					 They demanded the authorities stop the unreasonable lay-off and moves to undermine the trade unions.
					
					 At the end of the rally they made a demonstration march.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Hit for Fascist Suppression of Protestors
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Hit for Fascist Suppression of Protestors 
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The All-Islanders Measure Committee for Checking the Construction of Jeju Military Base in south Korea held a press conference outside the construction site of the Jeju naval base on July 25 denouncing the puppet authorities for their fascist suppression of the protestors against the construction of the base.
					 At the press conference speakers exposed that the director of the Police Agency appeared at the Sogwipho Police Station on Jeju Island and ordered the use of violence, branding the actions against the construction of the naval base as illegal.
					
					 According to his order the police occupied the Kangjong Village, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere, they charged.
					
					 This shows the authorities have no willingness to stop the construction of  the base, they said.
					
					 They would not move even a step back in the actions against the construction of the Jeju naval base, they noted.
					
					 They demanded the authorities stop at once the crackdown on the actions against the construction of the base.

articles.title: Month of International Solidarity with Korean People Closes in Cuba
articles.content:
Month of International Solidarity with Korean People Closes in Cuba
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The month of international solidarity with the Korean people came to a close in Cuba with due ceremony at the Cuba-DPRK Friendship Poultry Breeding Farm on July 22.
					 Attending the ceremony were the director of the Cuban Poultry General Bureau, officials of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, local party and power bodies and the Breeding Farm and masses.
					
					 Present on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and his embassy officials.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said the U.S. imperialists and their allies invaded the DPRK by mobilizing huge armed forces but they brought to their knees before the heroic Korean people with indomitable mental power.
					
					 The great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was a shining fruition of the gifted military idea, strategies and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, defeated in the Korean War for the first time in history, signed the armistice agreement on July 27, 1953 and admitted their disgraceful defeat before the world.
					
					 They are, however, posing constant threat to the DPRK while keeping in south Korea tens of thousands of their aggression troops armed with nukes and other modern lethal weapons.
					
					 The President's cause of national reunification is triumphantly advancing thanks to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration are the best way and landmark for Korea's independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 We will as ever strive for unbreakable friendship and unity between Cuba and the DPRK and always extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people's cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Praised by Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Praised by Mexican Organization
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released the 59th issue of its bulletin under the title of "21st century and Juche idea".
					 In an article subtitled "Banner inspiringly encouraging the trend of the 21st century to independence against imperialism" the bulletin said the present reality goes to more clearly prove the truth of the Juche idea publicly recognized as the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 In another article subtitled "The founder of socialist Korea who is author of the Juche idea" the bulletin noted: The works of President Kim Il Sung indicate the looks and features of the independent world, and concrete ways for making the world independent.
					
					 In an article subtitled "Idea giving correct answers to the important questions related to the existence of mankind" the bulletin stressed that to thoroughly apply the Juche idea is the only way out of the disasters and crisis the mankind is facing at present. 
					
					 The bulletin also carried a photo of the Tower of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Seminar on Work Held in South Africa
articles.content:
Seminar on Work Held in South Africa
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa on July 22 held a seminar on general secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Socialism Is a Science".
					 Present at the seminar were personages of the Group and the Democratic Teachers Union and popular masses of South Africa.
					
					 Chairman of the Group Eddie Kekana and other speakers explained in depth the concrete contents and significance of the work, which most correctly clarifies that socialism is sure to be revived and win final victory for its scientific accuracy and truth.
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK has been consolidated in the fierce struggle against the imperialists, they said, stressing that Korean-style socialism is invincible under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They lauded the Songun policy of the DPRK as a treasured sword of socialism and a symbol of its eternal invincibility.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Celebrate DPRK's War Victory Day
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Celebrate DPRK's War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Russian and Syrian papers gave special write-ups to the 58th anniversary of the Korean People's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Russian newspaper Patriot on July 21 carried in its three pages a photo of President Kim Il Sung delivering a speech at the Pyongyang city mass rally in celebration of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, a photo of the President and general secretary Kim Jong Il, and photos showing the changed Pyongyang city and an article titled "Victory".
					
					 The young DPRK won a brilliant victory in the war against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces on July 27, 1953, the article said, adding: The secret of the victory was the President and the exceptional self-sacrificing spirit and mass heroism of the army and people closely rallied around him.
					
					 With his extraordinary military wisdom and gifted stratagem unknown in the human history of wars the President smashed the enemies' military technical and numerical superiority by means of politico-ideological and strategic and tactical superiority, the article said.
					
					 The Syrian newspaper Al Baath on July 22 carried an article entitled "Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War".
					
					  The article praised the undying feats the President performed for the victory in the war by defeating the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, with his original military idea, strategy and tactics and war methods.

articles.title: Feats for Victory in War Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Feats for Victory in War Lauded Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Bulletins were issued in Ethiopia and Cambodia on July 18 and 19 to introduce the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung on the 58th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, in an article carried in the 26th issue of its bulletin, noted that nearly 60 years ago the Korean people shattered the armed invasion by the U.S. imperialists to win a brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					
					 The article further said:
					
					 The great victory of the Korean people would have been unthinkable without the gifted and extraordinary military strategies of the President.
					
					 The President advanced the original war methods to make sure that the Korean People's Army won victory after victory in each stage of the war to bring the final victory.
					
					 Clark, the then commander of the "UN Forces" who signed the Korean Armistice Agreement, confessed that the north Korean army's successes were attributable to the competent command of General Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The AKP News Agency of Cambodia, in an article carried in its bulletin, elaborated on the immortal feats of the President, who had advanced the Juche-based war methods suited to the specific realities and topographical conditions of Korea from the outset of the war and thus defeated the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to win in the war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il disfruta la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il disfruta la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
 Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion ofrecida por el Coro Estatal Benemerito en homenaje al 58o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					 Felicito calidamente por esa efemeride a los espectadores, que le aclamaban hospitalariamente, enviandoles un saludo cordial.
					
					 En la ocasion se presentaron los programas de diferentes generos, tales como el coro masculino "Himno al Mariscal Kim Il Sung", la musica orquestal y coro masculino "Paso de montana Mungyong", el coro masculino "Cancion del chofer", el solo femenino y coro masculino "Nadie lo sabe", el solo y coro masculinos "Por la unica patria", la serie de canciones de la opera revolucionaria "La historia de una enfermera", "Vamos al regazo del Lider", "?Donde esta el querido General?" y "?Que clase de hombres son los militantes del partido?" y el coro masculino "Camino de la victoria".
					
					 Los ejecutantes cantaron en tono altisonante los orgullosos meritos del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que bajo la sabia guia del Presidente Kim Il Sung, defendieron honrosamente la libertad y la independencia de la patria destruyendo por primera vez en la historia las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas acaudilladas por el imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					 Constataron el juramento de fe de todos los oficiales y soldados de convertir los vitores de la victoria en guerra en los ecos de fuegos artificiales del dia del triunfo de la causa de reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 Demostraron igualmente la ferrea determinacion del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu de defender la patria socialista como bastion inexpugnable al exterminar implacablemente con el poderio de las fuerzas armadas del Songun, consolidadas hasta ahora, a los imperialistas norteamericanos y los maniacos de enfrentamiento, enfrascados en provocar de nuevo la guerra, si estos se atreven a invadir, aunque una pulgada, el cielo, la tierra y el mar de la sagrada patria.
					
					 Kim Jong Il felicito la exitosa funcion devolviendo el saludo a los ejecutantes y espectadores que le vitoreaban.
					
					 Muy satisfecho de que el Coro Estatal Benemerito haya ofrecido esta magnifica funcion, evaluo altamente los exitos de la ocasion y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					 Disfrutaron el espectaculo junto con el los cuadros directivos de las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas: Kim Jong Un, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Choe Ryong Hae, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk, Kim Chang Sop y Ri Myong Su, los miembros de la Comision Militar Central del partido: Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong, Jong Myong Do, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol y Yun Jong Rin, y el jefe de departamento del CDN, Hyon Chol Hae.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il asiste a la recepcion por el 58o aniversario de victoria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il asiste a la recepcion por el 58o aniversario de victoria
 Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 58o aniversario de la gran victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecieron la vispera un banquete.
					 Fue invitado a la recepcion el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					 El felicito calidamente por dicha efemeride a los presentes en el banquete, quienes le aclamaban hospitalariamente, enviandoles un saludo cordial.
					
					 El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Ri Yong Ho.
					
					 Participaron aqui los vicepresidentes de la CMC del PTC: Kim Jong Un y Ri Yong Ho, los integrantes del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC: Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Jang Song Thaek, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Jong Gak, U Tong Chuk, Kim Chang Sop, Thae Jong Su, Mun Kyong Dok y otros, los miembros de la CMC del Partido y los funcionarios del CDN y de los organos de las fuerzas armadas, literatura y arte, prensa e informacion.

articles.title: Conversan en Pyongyang delegaciones del EPC y el EPL
articles.content:
Conversan en Pyongyang delegaciones del EPC y el EPL
 Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar hoy en esta capital las conversaciones entre la delegacion militar del Ejercito Popular de Corea y la delegacion del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular Lao.
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana Pak Jae Gyong, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, los generales y oficiales del EPC y por la parte laosiana, los miembros de la delegacion visitante encabezada por el jefe del Estado Mayor General Sanyahak Phomvihane, y el embajador lao en Corea, Chaleune Warinthrasaka.
					
					 Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el problema de desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad entre los ejercitos de los dos paises y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Conversan cancilleres de Corea y Malasia
articles.content:
Conversan cancilleres de Corea y Malasia 
 Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 26 las conversaciones entre el canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun, jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de visita en Malasia, y su homologo malasio Datuk Anifah Aman. 
					 Estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los integrantes de la delegacion y el embajador acreditado en ese pais, y por la contraparte, el primer subsecretario general del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, el director general de Asia Oriental y otros funcionarios. 
					
					 Ambas partes informaron la situacion de los respectivos paises e intercambiaron opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises y otros asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Concurso de oratoria de jovenes y estudiantes por el 27 de julio
articles.content:
Concurso de oratoria de jovenes y estudiantes por el 27 de julio
 Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en el teatro al aire libre del Parque Juventud el concurso nacional de oratoria de los jovenes y estudiantes dedicado al 58o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					 Los oradores alabaron las imborrables hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung realizadas por la victoria en esa guerra y expresaron la decision de apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del Songun del Dirigente   Kim Jong Il.
					
					 En su intervencion bajo el tema de "Invencible Comandante Insigne", Kim Kum Il, estudiante de la Universidad de Industria Ligera de Sinuiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, destaco que el Presidente es el extraordinario estratega militar e invencible comandante de acero quien dio golpes demoledores a los agresores imperialistas encabezados por EE.UU. y sento el brillante ejemplo de la guerra revolucionaria antiimperialista.
					
					 Conmovio a los espectadores la alocucion "Coraje sin igual" de Kim Un Gyong, integrante de la Union de la Juventud Socialista de la ciudad de Rason, que dio a conocer los nobles rasgos del Presidente quien, al prever el futuro de Corea triunfada, tomo las medidas de llamar a los soldados a las universidades y enviarlos el 3o Festival Mundial de la Juventud y los Estudiantes.
					
					 En su oracion "De un aliento", Kim Yong Hwa, obrera de la Direccion de Transporte de Pasajeros de la Capital, narro sobre el inagotable poderio espiritual de los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, participantes en la construccion de dique de Ryongrim de la Central Hidroelectrica No.1 de Huichon, quienes materializan cabalmente las ordenes del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il al igual que los combatientes heroes de la decada de 1950 del siglo pasado.
					
					 Jang Kwang Il, matriculado en una escuela de Hamhung, y Ju Hyon Gol, obrero de la Casa Cultural del distrito de Kumya, manifestaron la ferrea voluntad de 5 millones de vanguardias juveniles de no perdonar jamas a quienes se atrevan a desvirtuar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					 Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Ri Yong Chol, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios de la misma entidad, los jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos.
